title: Succulent slow cooker pulled pork
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) bone-in pork shoulder roast', '250ml root beer', '2 1/2 tablespoons light brown soft sugar', '2 teaspoons sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground paprika', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon celery salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '75ml balsamic vinegar', '350ml root beer', '3 tablespoons whisky', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '175g prepared barbecue sauce', '10 burger buns, split']
